text: Bartholomew Patrick "Bertie" Ahern (; born 12 September 1951, Dublin) is a former Taoiseach of Ireland leader of Fianna Fáil, the Irish Republic's largest political party. He oversaw the largest economic expansion in Irish history and was important in making the Good Friday Agreement. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Taoisigh of Ireland Category:Members of Dáil Éireann Category:Politicians from Dublin Category:Leaders of the Opposition (Ireland) Category:Tánaistí of Ireland
title: Bertie Ahern
